@yurmoma1023 wrote:

if anyone could give me a hint on how to fix the projectiles… they look like this…


If anyone could give me a hint on how to fix this be great…

o almost forgot heres my code for it…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 5; UseBow = true; createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 15, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); }

Ty, ~Tim~
